resources.string: This mode will required internet connection. You will be able to access full features of this application. Internet and battery usage is already optimized for good user experience. Don\'t worry, you can switch anytime from settings.
This is lightweight mode and do not require internet connection. Only basic features will be available. Don\'t worry, you can switch anytime from settings.
Are you sure you want to change online mode ? You can switch back again anytime :)
Are you sure you want to change offline mode ? You can switch back again anytime :)
Password must be at least 6 character long
Email is not found in our database, try registering instead ?
Email \'%1$s\' is already used by another user. If you think it was you, click on reset below and you will receive email with further instructions.
You are about to delete %1$s from this list.
